Name: Memento
Effect: The User faints. Reduce by 2 the foe's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense. Whole Scene Duration. This effect does not end by switching out the affected Pok√©mon.
Description: The user unleashes all its remaining power to send a wave of hopeless thoughts to haunt the foe's mind and soul. The target will be left in grief.
